--Switchblade/Megatron--

Switchblade sighs, and turns around.

"Perceptor, you're awefully bold, throwing around unfounded 
accusations." The devious bot says through a calm smile. His hands 
clasping his laser welders relax as he crosses his arms.

Shaking his head he continues both his face and words appear as an 
infallible mask of sincerity, "You really think I intend to over 
throw our mighty leader? Well, I've got news for you, I do NOT plan 
to overthrow Megatron, so drop your petty thoughts and go bother 
someone else who is more willing waste the energon to hit you." But 
in his mind, he adds on <what I plan to do, you don't need to know 
about...>.

The right side of Switchblade's mouth twitches upward, almost into a 
smirk, as he uncrosses his arms, and back up into a recently 
finished scrap parts chair. He waits patiently for Perceptor to get 
frustrated and leave him alone.

--------------------------------------

Megatron frowns as the computer screen comes to life with some 
untimely demise of his troups, except for Rage. Acting quickly(lol), 
he issues commands over the base commlink, "Nemesis Enforcer. 
Switchblade. Both of you meet me in the command room immeadiately. 
One of the scout parties has been disabled or something, we need to 
get there quickly and get them back to base. We cannot afford to 
lose any troops to the Maximals yet..." He stands up and an 
irritated evil look crosses his face as he waits for the two bots to 
show up.

--------------------------------------

Switchblade stops his patient waiting, and stands, "Sound like it's 
important... outta my way ya slag heap, I've got work to do." The 
black and green bot brushes past Perceptor, as he heads to the 
command room.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> Perceptor:
> 
> "So"replied Perceptor "do you think useless bot that you can lie 
> me... I know that you want overthrow Megatron"
